commentBody: The 49ers have kicked their fan base in teeth moving to a new Santa Clara stadium to fleece that communities public purse, the exorbitant jacking up of PSL fees for long-time fans, unceremoniously firing Jim Harbaugh (their only winning coach this century) and promoting a defensive line coach over qualified coordinators to be head coach during the 2015 season. Jim Tomsula was over his head from the moment his promotion was announced, as well as the majority of their current coordinators and position coaches. I'll be amazed if anyone with any talent or self-respect would consider coaching for the 49ers. It's become a franchise in free-fall, with an owner and GM who are too smug and clueless to turn things around and field a competitive team again.
